name: Nature of challenge
description: HL7 Standard Tables - Tables defined by the HL7 organization. Most tables in this category are related to the standard and its message structures.

values.description: Fasting (no calorie intake) for the period specified in the time component of the term, e.g., 1H POST CFST
Exercise undertaken as challenge (can be quantified)
